author: mysticryuujin
content:
If anyone would like to comment on this proposed JSON-RPC method, please feel free, it introduces a new namespace specifically for testing and a new method `testing_buildBlockV1` - we have a go-ethereum PR and OpenRPC specs, etc.

https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/710
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/747
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/33656
